title: Will concentrate on strengthening PMK at grassroots level, says Srikanthi Parasuraman

content: Is ‚Äòreduced emission fireworks‚Äô a better term to describe such ‚Äògreen‚Äô crackers? Who developed these fireworks?

title: Expose Congress failures, KTR tells party cadre
content: In a meeting with party MLAs, MLCs and corporators, as also the former legislators and corporators, here on Saturday, he asked them to work collectively to ensure the victory of BRS candidate Maganti Sunitha Gopinath in Jubilee Hills.

title: Kurnool bus tragedy: petrol, mobile phones, gas cylinder and inflammable material caused inferno
content: Emergency exits, cabin and main doors of the bus did not open, denying any chance to the passengers to escape from the bus, says DG of A.P. State Disaster Response and Fire Services Department

title: More amoebic meningoencephalitis cases reported in Kerala

title: Samagra Shiksha partners with NGO for holistic education of adolescent girls
content: The programme aims to conduct structured workshops and awareness sessions for girl students from Classes 6 to 10 on menstrual hygiene management, health, wellbeing and personal safety

title: Nitish urges Muslims to vote, days after Giriraj Singh‚Äôs controversial remarks
content: The Bihar Chief Minister sought votes from Muslims days after BJP Union Minister Giriraj Singh referred to them as ‚Äònamak haram‚Äô (traitors); he listed his government‚Äôs initiatives for the Muslim community, and alleged previous governments had neglected them

title: Infant dies near Ambur after house wall collapses
content: Police admitted the child at Government Taluk Hospital in Ambur town before she was referred to Government Medical College Hospital in Vellore where she later died.

title: Centre, T.N. government should work together on paddy procurement: Union Minister
content: The Minister was here as part of the ongoing Viksit Krishi Sankalp Abhiyan, a nationwide campaign that celebrates India‚Äôs progress in agriculture

title: Invalid votes, cross-voting pulled NC‚Äôs vote share down in each round of the J&K Rajya Sabha poll
content: There was one invalid vote in the first round, two in the second, and three in the third; with three candidates in the fray in the third round, the BJP managed one win, as cross-voting doomed the NC

title: Vellore GH celebrates International Day for Older Persons
content: According to a press release, this year‚Äôs theme is ‚ÄòOlder Persons Driving Local and Global Action: Our Aspirations, Our Well-Being and Our Rights.‚Äô

title: Power demand in State expected to exceed 19,000 MW by 2026: Navin Mittal
content: Instructs Chief Engineers and Superintending Engineers to complete all planned line repairs, installation of new transformers and other developmental works by December

title: Sharp decline in complaints received by Lokpal
content: The data available on the Lokpal‚Äôs website reveals that the Lokpal has ordered preliminary inquiries in only 289 cases against all the complaints it has received till now

title: Consumer group accuses Hescom of misusing review to hike tariffs
content: The Balakedarara Hitarakshaka Sangha, led by its president G.G. Hegde Kadekodi, filed the objection before the Karnataka Electricity Regulatory Commission. The group has opined that Hescom‚Äôs review petition is ‚Äònot maintainable in law‚Äô and ‚Äòan appeal in disguise‚Äô.

title: Vigyan Shri winner from Kerala has his sight set on Next Gen Launch Vehicle
content: Jayan N., project director of NGLV at the Vikram Sarabhai Space Centre, wins the award in the Space Science and Technology category for his contributions to developing cryogenic engines

title: Rice institute issues field-ready flood management advice for samba, thaladi
content: Excess water should be drained without delay and completely damaged patches be gap-filled with seedlings of the same variety where possible: K. Subrahmaniyan, TRRI Director

title: Watch: Why a young woman doctor‚Äôs alleged suicide points to a deeper systemic rot in Maharashtra
content: Recently, a young woman doctor allegedly died by suicide in Maharashtra‚Äôs Satara district. One of the two prime suspects, a police officer allegedly named as a rapist, is absconding.

title: Ensure milk, eggs are supplied in prescribed quantity in anganwadis, says SHRC
content: Directive to Women and Child Development dept. director to enforce guidelines issued for effective implementation of Poshaka Balyam in anganwadis

content: ‚ÄòThe primary objective of the move is to deter people who board trains with criminal intentions from committing offences‚Äô

title: Centre announces Rashtriya Vigyan Puraskar for scientific achievements
content: Physicist Jayant Narlikar, who passed away earlier this year, will be conferred Vigyan Ratna posthumously

title: Takeaways from Dodgers' series-tying win over Blue Jays
content: After Toronto rolled in the opener, Los Angeles rebounded to even the Fall Classic. Here's how it went down.

title: Yamamoto's 2nd straight CG ignites Dodgers in G2
content: Yoshinobu Yamamoto pitched a four-hitter for his second consecutive complete game, the first in the World Series since 2015, and the Los Angeles Dodgers defeated the Toronto Blue Jays 5-1 Saturday night, tying the best-of-seven matchup at one game apiece.

title: Manning injured as Longhorns rally for OT win
content: Backup Matthew Caldwell threw a scoring pass to Emmett Mosley V in OT after starter Arch Manning was knocked out of the game with an injury, and No. 22 Texas came back to defeat Mississippi State 45-38 on Saturday, improving to 6-2 (3-1 in the SEC).

title: Manfred: MLB 'vigilant' in policing sports betting
content: MLB commissioner Rob Manfred said the league has been "really vigilant" amid increasing questions about professional sports' ability to police the fallout from the widespread legalization of sports gambling.

title: NFL looks into Ravens for Lamar practice status
content: The NFL will investigate the Baltimore Ravens' handling of quarterback Lamar Jackson's practice participation, which led to the two-time NFL Most Valuable Player being ruled out because of a hamstring injury for Sunday's contest against the Chicago Bears.

title: Ducks QB Moore exits win after being hit in nose
content: Oregon quarterback Dante Moore suffered a bloody nose after taking a hard hit and exited Saturday's 21-7 win over Wisconsin in the third quarter.

title: Jones, Pereira call for fight at White House event
content: Jon Jones and Alex Pereira both stated Saturday they would like to face up against each other at the White House event slated for June.

title: üòè Ole Miss' jab at Oklahoma leads Week 9 trolls
content: The Rebels boosted their College Football Playoff hopes in a major way with a big win in Norman, Oklahoma.

title: UFC 321 takeaways: Heavyweight division still in ruins after Aspinall-Gane disaster
content: After a promising start to the UFC 321 headliner, an eye poke kept the heavyweight division in turmoil.

title: X-ray tables, marked cards and the Mafia: How the FBI says poker games were rigged
content: Details of how poker games, some involving Chauncey Billups, were allegedly rigged to make people lose big.

title: Catch up with our last-minute predictions, fantasy sleepers, more
content: Big game for Derrick Henry? Alec Pierce's first TD of the season? More fantasy upside for Joe Flacco? Here's what to know for Week 8.

title: Last season's good times for Liverpool feel a million miles away
content: Mo Salah is a shadow of himself, Arne Slot looks bereft of ideas, and Liverpool have now lost as many league games as they did in the entirety of last season.

title: Man United finally have momentum to fuel greater aspirations
content: Nothing comes easy for Man United, but Ruben Amorim's side still found a way to extend its winning run vs. Brighton.

title: Thamel: Five questions that will define a wild CFB coaching carousel
content: Big-money buyouts, big-name candidates and more coaches under pressure. Let's break down college football's biggest coaching questions.

title: WWE 'SmackDown' highlights: McIntyre heats up title match against Rhodes
content: Friday's "SmackDown" set up a perfect "Saturday Night's Main Event," with Drew McIntyre and Cody Rhodes ready for the challenge.

content: If this heavy bye week or injuries have you seeking lineup help, we have available options to consider.

content: Not since Messi vs. Ronaldo has the Barcelona-Real Madrid rivalry given us a matchup like Yamal vs. Mbappe. So, which superstar would you rather have?

title: Madrid vs. Bar√ßa head-to-head, form, key clashes, predictions, odds
content: When Real Madrid and Barcelona face off, there's nothing bigger happening anywhere in the soccer world.

title: Lando Norris gets dream Mexico pole: Max P5, Piastri P8
content: Lando Norris gave a significant boost to his championship chances by taking pole position for the Mexican Grand Prix while his title rivals qualified in fifth and eighth, respectively.

title: NFC East roundtable: Can the defending champs take the division crown again?
content: So far, every team in the NFC East except the Eagles has played three division games. Here's how they stack up.

content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst take the pulse of the league after a thrilling first few nights of 2025-26.

title: Steelers' 1933 striped throwbacks, Chargers' navy look top NFL Week 8 uniforms
content: It's the debut of a throwback uniform for the Steelers in Week 8, while the Eagles will also be wearing kelly green.

title: NFL Week 8's fashionable arrivals, featuring Justin Jefferson
content: From suits to streetwear, Week 8's arrivals mixed personal flair and cold-weather layers with comfort and creativity.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United optimistic over Hjulmand deal
content: Manchester United are optimistic they can secure a deal to sign Sporting CP midfielder Morten Hjulmand. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: ‚ÄòShe wanted to marry me‚Äô: Arrested Pune techie on doctor who died by suicide; probe takes new twist
content: A techie and a police sub-inspector were arrested in Satara for allegedly raping and abetting the suicide of a 28-year-old doctor. The techie's family claims the doctor harassed him, while police found chats indicating her stress. The doctor's suicide note named the two accused.

title: 'SoS, there‚Äôs a guy following us‚Äô: 2 Australian cricketers molested; accused tried to grab one
content: Two Australian cricketers were allegedly stalked and molested by a man in Indore while walking to a cafe. The accused, Akil Khan, was arrested after CCTV footage and a complaint from the team's security manager. The incident occurred near the team hotel, prompting an investigation into security protocols. The Australian team did not comment on the matter post-match.

title: 'India cutting back completely': Trump reiterates Russian oil claim; hopes for ‚Äòcomplete deal‚Äô with China
content: US President Donald Trump claimed India is significantly reducing Russian oil imports, even suggesting a complete cutback.  This comes as Trump prepares to meet China's Xi Jinping amid trade tensions. However, India has consistently denied these assertions, prioritizing its national interests and stating no such commitment has been made.

title: Rohit Sharma creates history, breaks multiple records in Australia ‚Äì Full list
content: Rohit Sharma achieved his 50th international century, a milestone only two other Indians have reached. He scored 121* against Australia in Sydney, topping the series with 202 runs and earning Player of the Match and Series. Sharma now holds records for most centuries by a visiting batter in Australia and is India's ninth-highest ODI run-getter.

title: ‚ÄòCan't stop‚Äô: From voice to Mico, Microsoft CEO shares 3 go-to AI tools
content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella revealed three indispensable Copilot AI features transforming daily work and personal life. He highlighted voice-activated Copilot on Windows as a revolutionary interaction method, akin to touchscreens. Additionally, Mico, the "Socratic Tutor" character, and Copilot's planning and learning capabilities are becoming essential tools for managing complex demands and maintaining sanity.

title: Reagan ad: Trump imposes additional 10% tariffs on Canada; cites 'hostile act'
content: President Trump announced a 10% tariff increase on Canadian goods, citing a "fake" advertisement featuring Ronald Reagan. This follows the end of trade talks and ongoing sectoral tariffs, despite the USMCA agreement maintaining tariff-free trade for most goods.

title: 'Perform kar, warna bahar bitha dunga': How Gambhir's stern message fired up Harshit Rana
content: Harshit Rana silenced critics with a stellar 4-wicket haul against Australia in the final ODI, showcasing his talent despite selection debates. Head coach Gautam Gambhir's stern warning to perform or be dropped fueled Rana's determination, leading to a career-defining performance at the SCG.

title: ‚ÄòToo much can go wrong‚Äô: Nvidia valuation nears $4 tn; analyst shares warning
content: While Nvidia nears a $4 trillion market cap, senior analyst Jay Goldberg remains the sole bear, holding a sell rating. He warns that the AI boom's massive infrastructure spending, driven by tech giants, mirrors the dot-com bubble's unsustainable hype, predicting a potential market reset when demand falters.

title: IND vs AUS: Sydney redemption! Virat, Rohit turn back the clock
content: On a golden Sydney evening, two men who have defined Indian cricket for over a decade found themselves writing the perfect epilogue. Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma ‚Äî both long retired from Tests and T20Is ‚Äî walked out one last time in blue on Australian soil. The result wasn‚Äôt just a win; it was a resurrection ‚Äî a poetic reminder that their story, even now, isn‚Äôt done.

title: ‚Äò13,000x faster‚Äô: Sundar Pichai hails ‚Äòverifiable quantum edge‚Äô; Musk reacts
content: Google's Willow chip has achieved a verifiable quantum advantage, running a new algorithm 13,000 times faster than the best supercomputers. This breakthrough, named Quantum Echoes, can explain atomic interactions and paves the way for drug discovery and materials science. The verifiable result marks a significant step towards real-world quantum computing applications.

title: What happened to Tom Aspinall after eye poke by Ciryl Gane in UFC title fight
content: Tom Aspinall's UFC heavyweight title defense against Ciryl Gane in Abu Dhabi ended as a no-contest after just four minutes due to an accidental eye poke. Aspinall was rushed to the hospital unable to see, expressing frustration over the fight's premature stoppage. Gane apologized, calling the incident an unlucky accident.

title: Justice Surya Kant poised to be next CJI: Landmark verdicts; humble start
content: Justice Surya Kant, the most senior Supreme Court judge, is set to become the Chief Justice of India next month. Hailing from a humble village in Haryana, his journey to the nation's highest judicial office is marked by perseverance and dedication. He will be the first Haryanvi to hold this prestigious position.

title: UFC 321 Abu Dhabi: Aspinall vs Gane title fight ‚Äî time, where to watch, results
content: UFC 321 is live from Abu Dhabi, featuring Tom Aspinall defending his heavyweight title against Ciryl Gane and Mackenzie Dern challenging for the strawweight belt. The stacked card includes other exciting matchups, with fans worldwide tuning in for the championship bouts. The event continues to showcase UFC's global reach and fan engagement.

title: Beware Shahid Afridi! Rohit Sharma is set to dethrone former Pakistan captain
content: Rohit Sharma's explosive unbeaten century and Virat Kohli's solid 74* powered India to a nine-wicket victory over Australia in the final ODI. Despite the win, India lost the series 1-2. Pacer Harshit Rana impressed with four wickets, restricting Australia to 236. Sharma's 121* also brought him closer to Shahid Afridi's six-hitting record.

title: Cardi B opens up on Offset marriage regrets during pregnancy with Diggs
content: Cardi B is preparing to welcome her fourth child with Stefon Diggs while navigating a difficult divorce from Offset. She recently expressed her wish for Offset to be a better person for their children, acknowledging his past infidelity. Offset has since admitted to cheating, taking responsibility for his "bad decisions."

title: Ayesha Curry surprises fans with custom warriors gift amid divorce rumors
content: Stephen Curry kicked off the NBA season with a stellar performance, leading the Warriors to victory. Meanwhile, his wife Ayesha received a unique, custom-designed Warriors jersey from Kristin Juszczyk. Ayesha's social media posts, including one referencing "Year 17," sparked fan confusion, while recent divorce rumors were debunked, with Ayesha clarifying her past views on marriage and motherhood.

title: 'Will address in coming days': Tejashwi hints at Muslim deputy CM; responds after criticism
content: Tejashwi Yadav hinted at a Muslim deputy chief minister if the opposition alliance wins in Bihar, responding to criticism over naming a Mallah leader.  He accused the BJP of hypocrisy regarding caste and community representation, highlighting the significance of the EBC vote bank in the state's political landscape.

title: Confirmed: 'Rohit Sharma will play 2027 ODI World Cup and retire after that'
content: Rohit Sharma's childhood coach, Dinesh Lad, revealed the veteran batter plans to retire after the 2027 ICC Cricket World Cup. Sharma's explosive century in the third ODI against Australia, where he was named Player of the Match and Series, capped off a dominant performance.

title: Why is streamer Asmongold facing backlash on X over his reaction to fan art?
content: Asmongold faces backlash on X after dismissing a fan's artwork, with critics claiming he's become harsh and uncaring. He defended his reaction by citing inaccuracies in the fan art's depiction of a World of Warcraft weapon. Separately, Asmongold questioned the future of TwitchCon following an incident where streamer Emiru was grabbed, suggesting the event is no longer safe.

title: Ice cream and diabetes: Effects on blood sugar and smart ways to enjoy it
content: Managing diabetes doesn't mean a complete ban on sweets.  Research suggests moderate ice cream consumption might even lower type 2 diabetes risk.  Enjoying this treat is possible by controlling portions, choosing lower-sugar options, and pairing it with protein or fibre.  Careful planning and mindful choices are key to a balanced, diabetes-friendly diet.

title: Virat Kohli's sister shares emotional message, dedicates 've mahiya tere vekhan nu'
content: Virat Kohli's sister shared an emotional tribute after India's dominant nine-wicket ODI win against Australia. Rohit Sharma's century and Kohli's unbeaten 74 guided the chase, with the duo's partnership reminiscent of their prime. Kohli also became the second-highest ODI run-scorer, surpassing Kumar Sangakkara.

title: Andhra bus fire: Smartphone consignment may have intensified blaze; probe on
content: A tragic bus fire in Tirupati, claiming lives, was likely exacerbated by a large consignment of 234 new smartphones. The phones' lithium-ion batteries reportedly exploded due to "thermal runaway" after the bus hit a bike, intensifying the blaze.  Investigators are probing the bus operator for carrying commercial cargo, potentially turning an accident into a firestorm.

title: Aulina Gretzky brings laughs with Craig Conover in viral ‚ÄòThe Office‚Äô spoof
content: Paulina Gretzky teams up with Craig Conover for a fun recreation of a popular scene from The Office.  Meanwhile, her father, hockey legend Wayne Gretzky, is active in Europe, attending business forums and meeting fans.  He also continues his role in sports broadcasting.  The Gretzky family continues to make news both online and in the sports world.

title: Travis Hunter's wife Leanna Lenee‚Äôs viral clip that once sparked cheating allegations
content: A past video of Leanna Lenee dancing with another man caused a stir.  Travis Hunter defended her, calling it clickbait.  Lenee also clarified her past comments.  Now, in 2025, the couple shares joy with their baby boy.  Their family life overshadows the old controversy.  This shows how relationships evolve beyond single moments.

title: Rashtriya Ekta Diwas: PM Modi to witness ‚Äòdesi‚Äô dog squads; canines trained by BSF
content: Indian breed dogs like Mudhol and Rampur Hounds, once championed by Prime Minister Modi, will march at the Rashtriya Ekta Diwas parade. These resilient 'desi' dogs, trained by the BSF, have proven effective in various operations, showcasing their agility and adaptability to Indian conditions.

title: Kotak Mahindra consolidated net profit for Q2FY26 drops by 11%; at Rs 4,468 cr - details
content: Kotak Mahindra Bank's consolidated net profit for Q2FY26 saw an 11% decline due to higher provisions, despite continued credit and deposit growth. CEO Ashok Vaswani remained non-committal on reports of interest in acquiring IDBI Bank, emphasizing the bank's focus on scaling through both organic and inorganic avenues. The bank evaluates opportunities based on strategic fit, management bandwidth, and financial valuations.

title: NFL star dragged into Mafia-led NBA poker scandal over $1M cheating claim
content: NBA coach Chauncey Billups and other athletes are implicated in a massive FBI gambling bust.  Agents uncovered a high-tech cheating ring, allegedly backed by mafia families, that defrauded players of over a million dollars in a single night.  Advanced technology, including marked cards and modified shuffling machines, was reportedly used in the scheme.

title: Maharashtra doctor suicide case: Policeman arrested; accused of rape and abetment
content: Police have arrested sub-inspector Gopal Badane, the second accused in the suicide case of a woman doctor from Satara, Maharashtra. This arrest follows closely on the heels of the apprehension of Prashant Bankar, the landlord's son and a co-accused. Bankar has been remanded to four days of police custody.

title: 'Exposure to Adani much less than to other groups': Officials on LIC; question US report timing
content: Government officials have denied allegations of influencing LIC's investment decisions, stating the insurer's board-approved policies govern its investments. They emphasized LIC's exposure to the Adani Group is significantly less than to other major conglomerates like Tata and Reliance, with investments subject to regulatory oversight.

title: RS poll: NC denies ‚Äòmatch fixing‚Äô charge; Omar refuses to reveal who cross-voted for BJP
content: Political tensions escalated in Kashmir after the BJP secured a Rajya Sabha seat with support from legislators outside the party. While National Conference leadership denied cross-voting allegations, party president Farooq Abdullah revealed the BJP had approached them for a seat prior to the polls, a claim refuted by Sajad Lone.

title: Blake Lively‚ÄìJustin Baldoni legal drama shifts as Swift, Kelce stay away
content: Blake Lively's legal battle with Justin Baldoni has reportedly strained her friendship with Taylor Swift. Lively's legal team accuses Baldoni of withholding evidence, while Swift has remained distant. Sources suggest Lively fears the fallout could impact her and Ryan Reynolds' careers, as Swift's influence in Hollywood is immense.

title: ‚ÄòUnforeseen factors rising‚Äô: Xi sounds alarm ‚Äì key challenges loom as China sets 5-yr plan
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping warned of rising uncertainties as the Communist Party approved its next five-year plan, emphasizing technological innovation and economic restructuring. The blueprint, personally shaped by Xi, aims to strengthen China's domestic market and "real economy" amidst global volatility and domestic headwinds.

title: Canada visa crisis: Refusal rate crosses 50%; court filings skyrocket - what's going on?
content: Canada's immigration system is experiencing an unprecedented surge in visa and permit refusals, leading to widespread concerns about automated decision-making replacing human assessment. This crisis is fueling a significant rise in judicial reviews as applicants challenge decisions deemed generic and unreasonable, with numbers of new temporary residents, particularly students, declining sharply.

title: Hospital reveals Satish Shah was found unresponsive at home; last rites to be held tomorrow
content: Veteran actor Satish Shah, known for his unforgettable performances in Sarabhai vs Sarabhai and Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro, passed away at the age of 74 on October 25. The actor, who had reportedly been unwell for the past few months, breathed his last due to kidney failure.

title: Trump Repeats India-Pak Truce Claim, Says 'Thought Russia-Ukraine Easier'
content: Trump has been repeatedly claiming that he helped to secure a "full and immediate" ceasefire between the nuclear-armed neighbours India and Pakistan after talks reportedly mediated by Washington.

title: Mentally Challenged Woman In UP Kills Her Children, Then Hangs Self
content: A mentally challenged woman killed her two children before hanging herself on Saturday evening, police said. The incident took place in the Semri village of Kachhwa.

title: 'Vote For Jan Suraaj, Never Go Outside Bihar For Work': Prashant Kishor
content: Jan Suraaj Party founder Prashant Kishor said that the party will bring an abundance of opportunities within the state, and people won't have to leave their hometown in search of jobs, if they vote for the party in the upcoming Bihar elections.

title: 'He Would Never Die By Suicide': Father Of NEET Aspirant Found Dead In Kota
content: The father of a NEET-UG exam aspirant from Odisha who was found dead in his hostel room in Kota said that his son would never die by suicide.

title: "Friend To The World": Trump Hosts Qatar Emir On Air Force One
content: The Qatari leaders boarded Air Force One when it landed at Al Udeid Air Base, which hosts the regional headquarters for the US military and thousands of American troops.

title: Australian Women Cricketers Harassed. A Reminder Of Cracks In "Safe City" Indore
content: The shocking incident occurred around 11 am on Thursday, when two Australian cricketers left the Radisson Blu Hotel, where the team had been staying, to visit a nearby cafe.

title: 5 Children Test HIV-Positive After Blood Transfusion In Jharkhand
content: Four more children suffering from thalassemia were detected HIV-positive in Jharkhand's Chaibasa town on Saturday during an investigation by a five-member medical team from Ranchi, taking the total number of affected minors to five.

title: "They Run A Fraud Ad": Trump Raises Tariffs On Canada By 10%
content: The announcement came two days after Trump said he had terminated all trade talks with Canada over what he called the "fake" ad campaign.

title: Israel Conducts Strike Targeting Islamic Jihad Member In Gaza
content: The Israeli military said on Saturday that it conducted an air strike targeting an alleged Islamic Jihad militant in central Gaza, despite a ceasefire brokered by US President Donald Trump.

title: Video: Karnataka Ex-MLA Gored During Bull Race Festival
content: A former MLA in Karnataka's Shivamogga district was injured after being gored by a bull during a traditional bull race festival - Hori Habba.

title: Woman Leaves Mid-Argument, Her Husband Slits Their Twin Daughters' Throats
content: A man in Maharashtra quarrelled with his wife. As soon as the woman left for her parents' home during the argument, the man took his two-year-old twin daughters to a forested area, slit their throats.

title: Cop Accused Of Raping Maharashtra Doctor Who Died By Suicide Arrested
content: Police sub-inspector Gopal Badane, an accused in the alleged suicide of a woman government doctor in Maharashtra's Satara district, was arrested on Saturday evening hours after a co-accused had been nabbed.

title: "I Am Not Done": Kamala Harris Hints At US Presidential Run Again
content: Kamala Harris said she expects a woman will be president in the coming years, and it could "possibly" be her.

title: Man, 55, Dies After Being Run Over By Rashly Driven Thar In Uttarakhand
content: A 55-year-old man was killed Saturday morning after being hit by a speeding Thar in Uttarakhand's Haldwani, police said.

title: "I'm Safe In Imphal": Thadou Tribe Leader's Message Of Peace In Manipur
content: A young leader of the Thadou tribe has been living in Manipur's Imphal valley for the last one month and sharing updates from the city to demolish what he called a deliberate narrative of fear-mongering.

title: Video: No Bridge, Odisha Villagers Use Rope, Metal Pot To Cross River
content: Tribal villagers in Kadamaha village in Odisha's Kandhamal district risk their lives every day to cross a river due to the lack of a bridge and proper connectivity.

title: Class 11 Student Rescued After Teenagers Attempt Gunpoint Kidnapping In Delhi
content: A group of teenagers allegedly tried to abduct a Class 11 student at gunpoint from outside a private school in South Delhi's Greater Kailash area following a quarrel between two groups of students, police said on Saturday.

title: In Doctor Suicide Case, Father's Death Penalty Appeal To Devendra Fadnavis
content: The father of the 26-year-old doctor who died by suicide in Maharashtra's Satara has sought the death penalty for the culprits responsible for her daughter's death.

title: Amit Shah seeks the blessings of Bihar voters for another five years
content: He also wishes the people on the State‚Äôs biggest festival, the ‚ÄòChhath‚Äô, that began with Nahay Khay on October 25.

title: Procurement of paddy is on in full swing across Delta districts, say officials
content: Tiruvarur, Mayiladuthurai, and Nagpattinam districts alone have accounted for procurement of  3,98,636 tonnes with a total of ‚Çπ970.74 crore paid to bank accounts of 66,245 farmers

title: As Cyclone Montha looms, IMD issues alerts for Andhra Pradesh
content: Red alert has been issued for at least 12 districts on October 28 and 29; the well-marked low-pressure area is likely to intensify into a deep depression by October 26 and into a cyclonic storm  by October 27, and then into a severe cyclonic storm by October 28 and cross the Andhra Pradesh coast between Machilipatnam and Kalingapatnam, says the weatherman

title: Bihar election: Woman‚Äôs identity is often tied to her male relative, says CPI(ML)‚Äôs Digha candidate Divya Gautam
content: Her connection to deceased actor Sushant Singh Rajput, who was her cousin, has become a talking point. Ms. Gautam, a theatre actor and PhD scholar of gender studies hopes that the narrative will soon turn to her work

title: Families of Indians stuck in Russian warzone say they last heard from them 50-days ago
content: At least two Indians have been killed in the Russia-Ukraine war since September, and the body of one of them arrived from Russia on October 18; the MEA had said previously that it had taken up the matter with Russian authorities and insisted that the practice of recruiting Indians in the war be ended and that ‚Äòour nationals be released‚Äô

title: Tensions mount in Aligarh over religious slogan written on temple walls
content: Local police register case against 7 people in some villages of the U.P. district; right-wing activists demand action against culprits

title: PM SHRI won‚Äôt alter curriculum of Kerala schools: Minister
content: PM SHRI agreement signed to utilise Central funds for improving physical infrastructure of schools and not to surrender the State‚Äôs syllabus to the Union government, says Sivankutty.

title: Collector urges officials to enforce road safety rules, identify accident-prone areas
content: Between January and September this year, 429 road accidents occurred in the Sri Sathya Sai district, resulting in 255 casualties and 483 injuries, says Shyam Prasad

title: Government will take steps to protect conventional media amid digital disruption: I&B Minister
content: The Registrar of Newspapers for India, the Press Information Bureau, and the Central Bureau of Communication would soon be integrated for efficient coordination and convergence across media outreach and regulatory functions, Ashwini Vaishnaw said

title: Bihar‚Äôs Gaura-Bauram goes to VIP in last minute seat-sharing deal, RJD candidate refuses to withdraw

content: the 2025 MLS Cup playoffs kicked off on Wednesday with the wild card round, which saw the ninth seeds from both the East and West get knocked out . this phase of the postseason moves quickly, with the dust on Wednesday's Wild Card games having barely settled before inter Miami and Nashville SC get Round 1 underway on Friday night . the 'futbol Americas' crew debate who's the leading contenders to win the MLS cup .

title: 'Not an unlawful assembly: Madras HC on Ram Temple telecast; quashes FIR against 5
content:
Madras HC

CHENNAI: Madras HC quashed an FIR against five men accused of creating public disturbance in Coimbatore while watching live telecast of the Ram Lalla consecration event at the Ayodhya temple last year, ruling that gathering for a religious event cannot be treated as an unlawful assembly, reports Sureshkumar K. Justice N Sathish Kumar said the prosecution's materials did not show that the accused used criminal force, committed any offence, or interfered with anyone's rights. According to the complaint, the men had installed an LED screen outside a temple to stream the event, allegedly causing traffic congestion. The high court held there were no specific allegations or evidence to support charges, observing that gatherings for religious functions cannot be criminalised merely because some groups raise grievances.

End of Article

title: 'Simplification, transparency': 31 Customs duty notifications merged; will ease compliance
content: the central board of indirect taxes and customs rolled out a trade facilitation measure . it said the new notification would be effective from Nov 1 . the department has taken measures to ease redundancy and preserve existing benefits .

title: 5-year plan: Central funds to be tied to education results; focus on 5 main goals
content: Manash Pratim Gohain is a seasoned journalist with over two decades at The Times of India, where he has built a rich body of work spanning education policy, politics, and governance. Renowned for his incisive coverage of the National Education Policy (NEP) 2020, accreditation reforms, and skilling initiatives, he has also reported on student politics, urban policy, and social movements. His political reportage‚Äîboth reflective and news-driven‚Äîadds depth to his writing, bridging policy with public impact. Through his 2,500 articles and related outlets, he has emerged as a trusted voice in national discourse, particularly in linking education reform to broader societal change. Read More

title: 'Trishul': India to hold major military exercise; all 3 services to participate
content: India is conducting a major tri-Service combat exercise called ‚ÄúTrishul‚Äù on the western front with Pakistan . a NOTAM (notice to airmen) issued for all aircraft to avoid a vast swathe of airspace along the border in Rajasthan and Gujarat from Oct 30 to Nov 10 . Pakistan has issued a notification restricting multiple air traffic routes along its central and southern airspace .

title: Rave party busted in Ahmedabad; 20 arrested - including 13 foreign students
content:
Representational image

AHMEDABAD: A DJ party at a farmhouse in Ahmedabad's Shilaj locality turned into a raid, with undercover officers from Bopal police finding liquor and hookahs - both prohibited in Gujarat - being openly served. By Saturday morning, 20 people, including 13 foreign students, two bootleggers and owners of the farmhouse, were arrested. "...Thirteen African students and two others were found to have consumed liquor. No drug was found on the premises. The hookahs have been sent to FSL to check for presence of drugs," said Om Prakash Jat, SP (Ahmedabad rural). Police seized 51 bottles of Indian-made foreign liquor and 15 hookahs.

End of Article
